item.title: Embedding R into Jupyter
item.description: How to embed R into Jupyter? There is a simple way to embed R into Jupyter Notebook. Suppose you already have installed R and anocoda with jupyter Add the local path of Anocoda and Python to your system Environment, such as C:\Program Files\Python37\Scripts\ and C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\condabin\ On Rgui or Rstudio, type install.packages(c('repr', 'IRdisplay', 'evaluate', 'crayon', 'pbdZMQ', 'devtools', 'uuid', 'digest')) devtools::install_github('IRkernel/IRkernel') Keep typing
